title: Immigration law: a delicate balance
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Joseph Koenig and Arnie Gelbart
brief_description: The immigration law, and its enforcement, are examined in this documentary. It is a difficult exercise in which objective and non discriminatory criteria are applied in the screening of each prospective new Canadian. Case histories illustrate various aspects of this law.
